verses.esv:
2   It is in vain that you rise up early
    and go late to rest,
  eating the bread of anxious toil;
    for he gives to his beloved sleep.
verses.kjv: 2 It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.
verses.niv: 2 In vain you rise early and stay up late, toiling for food to eat- for he grants sleep to those he loves.
